books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: The lives of patients, doctors and activists intersect when a gunman holds them all hostage in a woman's health center in Mississippi.
books.name: A SPARK OF LIGHT

books.author: by Kyle Mills
books.description: When the Russian prime minister plots to invade the Baltics, only Mitch Rapp can stop him.
books.name: VINCE FLYNN: RED WAR

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: A Seattleite cook stuck in remote Ponder, Alaska, grapples with her feelings for the local swordsmith.
books.name: ALASKAN HOLIDAY

books.author: by Kevin Kwan
books.description: A New Yorker gets a surprise when she spends the summer with her boyfriend in Singapore.
books.name: CRAZY RICH ASIANS

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: The fourth book in the Cormoran Strike series. Detectives Strike and Ellacott investigate a crime a young man may have witnessed as a child; by J. K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: LETHAL WHITE

books.author: by James Patterson and Nancy Allen
books.description: Ruby Bozarth defends a college football star charged in a felony case complicated by a second murder.
books.name: JUROR #3

books.author: by  David Weber
books.description: The Star Kingdom’s Grand Fleet commander takes on the Solarian League’s corrupt leaders and its navy. The 19th book in the Honor Harrington series.
books.name: UNCOMPROMISING HONOR

books.author: by J.R. Ward
books.description: Anne Ashburn teams up with fireman Danny Maguire to track down a serial arsonist.
books.name: CONSUMED

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Anne Rice
books.description: The latest in the Vampire Chronicles series details Prince Lestat’s reign over the vampire world.
books.name: BLOOD COMMUNION

books.author: by Gail Honeyman
books.description: A young woman’s well-ordered life is disrupted by the I.T. guy from her office.
books.name: ELEANOR OLIPHANT IS COMPLETELY FINE

books.author: by Bernard Cornwell
books.description: The Saxon Tales series continues as Uhtred of Bebbanburg fights a new foe who controls an army of wolf-warriors and wants to rule Northumbria.
books.name: WAR OF THE WOLF

books.author: by Hank Green
books.description: After posting a video that goes viral, April May must deal with the pressures of becoming an internet sensation.
books.name: AN ABSOLUTELY REMARKABLE THING

books.author: by Kevin Kwan
books.description: The second book in the Crazy Rich Asians trilogy. As her wedding draws near, Rachel Chu discovers her birth father.
books.name: CHINA RICH GIRLFRIEND
